tuv.seg: ATC - Automatic Tool Changer
ATC - 自動換刀器
Accuracy Options - These machine options will help you locate your material and tools for more accurate cut parts.
準確性選項 - 幫助材料及工具定位的選項，以更準確地切削。
CNC System Options
CNC 系統選項

Combined with an HSD quick release spindle, and using aseven ortwenty-one position automatic carousel, the ATC system isthe fastest method ofchanging tools on a regular basis and willdeliver adramatic improvement inthroughput capacity when processing multiple tool operations.
結合 HSD 快速釋放主軸，並使用七或二十一段自動轉盤，ATC 系統為最快速的換刀系統並能藉由多工操作大幅改進產出能力。
Configuration Options
組態選項
Configuration Options - These describe the different styles of gantry and tooling configurations that are currently available forAXYZ Systems.
組態選項 - AXYZ 系統目前可用之不同樣式的支架與加工組態。
Cutting Options - These are the primary cutting tools that are available, including routers, knives, drills and more.
切削選項 - 可用的主要切削工具，包括路達、刀具、鑽頭和更多的切削工具。
Faster and more flexible production isaseasy as choosing asingle, double oreven triple head carriage formultiple tasking operations.
作為選擇單一，雙 oreven 三頭馬車能夠任務操作的速度更快和更靈活的生產 isaseasy。
Integrated Solutions Delivering everything our Customers need
整合式解決方案提供我們的客戶一切所需
Most of these options apply to the AXYZ Series machine exclusively.
以上選項多數為 AXYZ 系列機台獨有。
Multiple Tools
多工具
Others are available on the CAMTECH and PACER systems as well.
其他可用於 CAMTECH 和 PACER 系統，
Rout.
潰敗。
Secondary Options - These are typically accessories to make more efficient use of your CNC Router, including misters, swarf collection feet and more.
輔助選項 - 幫助用戶更有效率地使用 CNC 雕刻機之配件，包括冷卻噴嘴、集屑器腳座和更多的配件。
Speak toan AXYZ technical sales specialist to configure the machine to best suit your needs.
請向 AXYZ 技術銷售專員諮詢以獲得最適合您的需求之機台組態。
The AXYZ 7G and 21G automatic tool changer systems provide an easy and convenient method ofrunning jobsrequiring multiple routing tools.
AXYZ 7G 和 21G 自動換刀系統提供運行多路徑工作方便快捷的方法。
The machine options have been divided into 5 sections:
機台選項可分為五個部分：
The option set that AXYZ International has developed over the last 20years iseasily the most diverse in the industry.
AXYZ 國際在過去的 20 年所開發選項組合為業界最多元化的組合。
This tooling configuration is popular forapplications that typically require only two orthree tooling processes.
這種模具配置是通常要求只有兩個兩三家工裝過程的流行 forapplications。
Through ongoing research and development, and close ties with our industry partners and vendors, AXYZ has been able to create a large set of machine options that add enormous value toour customers.
藉由不斷進行研發，並與業界合作夥伴和供應商的密切合作，AXYZ 有能力生產為我們客戶帶來極大價值之大型機台組合。
Vacuum System Options - These options include vacuum hold down pumps and blowers, as well as swarf collection systems.
真空系統選項 - 包括真空吸附泵和風機，以及集屑系統。
profile, trim and drill inaseamless sequence.
設定檔、 修剪和鑽 inaseamless 序列。
